body:
So I was playing on the walls wild west map and I'm now curious how many diamonds are in each quad.
I have a picture of two guys that had a total of 34 diamonds from their quad. They hadn't left their quad, invaded the middle, nor fought anyone except me in their quad.  The one guy has my dia helm and the other guy has my boots from the middle diamonds.

Is it possible to have 34 diamonds in just one quad on this map? They both had chestplates, pants, and swords.  Maybe this is a question for the map maker, itaity.
body_tagged:

title: walls - wild west

replies.body: I've just analyzed the map with MCedit, and it turned that there are 73 diamonds in each quad, so I guess that 34 is not that hard to obtain
